doc.previous: One system of formulas for Reclining Declining sundials 46  There are various solution approaches including some using the methods of rotation matrices and some making a 3D model of the reclined declined plane and its vertical declined counterpart plane extracting the geometrical relationships between the hour angle components on both these planes and then reducing the trigonometric algebra 44 45
